channel.title: Monsters on my server
channel.description:
Yes, i know how to get monsters to my server, but when i hit them, it hits 0 and then they die and they doesn't drop anything.. Could you help me to get those to drop something and i want that i can hit like 30 them and they dont die.. :eek:
Sry for my language, im from Finland..
